snippet: A Chinese official called the United Nations report on human rights in North Korea “unreasonable criticism.”
abstract: Chinese officials criticize United Nations report that serves notice to North Korean leader Kim Jong-un; report says he might be personally held liable in court for crimes against humanity committed by state institutions and officials under his direct control.

byline.original: By GERRY MULLANY and NICK CUMMING-BRUCE

lead_paragraph: A Chinese official called the United Nations report on human rights in North Korea “unreasonable criticism.”

headline.main: China Faults Report Blaming North Korean Leader for Atrocities
headline.print_headline: China: U.N. Report on North Korea Is Denounced as Unreasonable

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
